blogData.title: Visual Guides: How To Sign-Up
blogData.keywords: "sign up", "how to sign up", "sign-up", "translation", "translation app", "translate", "content", "AI", "artificial intelligence", "youtube subtitles", "video caption", "youtube captions"

data.richContent:
The below describes how to sign-up to the Video Translator application. Following sign-up, how to login to the platform is also covered.

Steps

To sign-up for the application, please follow the below steps:

  1. Please direct your browser to videotranslator.ai, and then click on the Sign Up button.
  2. Please input your email address, and select languages. Your primary language is assumed to be English, and you will be able to select an additional 2 languages (additional languages are available within the application). Please contact us for alternative primary languages.
    < img src=“https://storage.googleapis.com/site-assets-prod/blog_assets/sign-up.jpg” alt=“Sign-Up: Select English, German and Spanish” caption=“Sign-Up: Select English, German and Spanish” >
  3. Please enter your credit card details, and sign up. Please note card shown below is a sample credit card. On signing up, you will receive an email to enroll into the application.
    < img src=“https://storage.googleapis.com/site-assets-prod/blog_assets/sign-up-card.jpg” alt=“Sign-Up: Add Credit Card” caption=“Sign-Up: Add Credit Card” >
  4. Verify your email address, add your preferred name and password, and log in to the application. Please note, the image below is from the User Acceptance Testing (UAT) application, in Production the application will simply say Video Translator.
    < img src=“https://storage.googleapis.com/site-assets-prod/blog_assets/enroll.jpg” alt=“Sign-Up: Enroll with Name and Password” caption=“Sign-Up: Enroll with Name and Password” >
  5. On a successful enroll, you will be logged into the application, and you should see your account, with some default items as per below.
    < img src=“https://storage.googleapis.com/site-assets-prod/blog_assets/first-login.jpg” alt=“Sign-Up: Auto-Login after Enroll” caption=“Sign-Up: Auto-Login after Enroll” >
  6. Congratulations, you are now ready to translate your content!

Conclusion

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

We are very grateful for your support!

Should you have any questions, or just want to drop us a note saying hello, please feel free to send us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.
